pr_title: Hmusum/use remote session repo for finding active session

timeline.message: Move one test to another class and remove 2 tests that are tested elsewhere

Use remote session repo to find active session

Active session is not necessarily a local session, it might have been
created on another config server.

timeline.bodyText: Could probably remove most of these from LocalSession, if they're not to be used on that?
timeline.author: jonmv

replies.bodyText: I think I removed those that could be removed. I want to do more refactoring in this area, but let's try this first.
replies.author: hmusum
